fxInfo_clarification: These are ordinalized versions of the V-Dem division of power index. The original index ranges from 0 to 1. These transformations offer three different ordinal versions with three _3C, four _4C, and five _5C levels respectively.
fxInfo_question: Are there elected local and regional governments, and — if so — to what extent can they operate without interference from unelected bodies at the local level?
name: e_v2x_feduni_3C /_4C /_5C
